trans-unit.source: Defines values for specifying one of three possible states.
trans-unit.target: 定義用於指定三種可能狀態的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewTriState enumeration is useful whenever a third state is needed in addition to the two states of the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
trans-unit.target: 除了兩個狀態的需要第三個狀態時，會很實用 DataGridViewTriState 列舉<xref:System.Boolean>型別。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is of type DataGridViewTriState so that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object can indicate no preference in regards to the text wrapping of a cell value, and can instead indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> value of a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object should be used.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是型別 DataGridViewTriState 因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>物件可指出沒有喜好設定中的文字會換行的資料格的值，可以改為顯示，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>的不同值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>物件應該使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The property's state is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的狀態是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property is not set and will behave in a default manner.
trans-unit.target: 屬性未設定，且可運作的預設方式。

trans-unit.source: The property's state is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的狀態是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
